TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Docs.summary: Interacts with the parser to build a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool AllowWhitespaceLiterals() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether white spaces are allowed in literals for this control.
Docs.returns: Overloaded to always returns to indicate that white spaces are not allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder.AllowWhitespaceLiterals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to ignore white space in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
